_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Qualifications for being called a 'mendi: If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the eye
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with the ear
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with the nose
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with the tongue
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with the body
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with the mind
If they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the eye
If they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the mind
If they’re freed by not grasping by disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the eye
If they’re freed by not grasping by disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the mind
